hints.text: 🥛 I like to drink milk!
🧶 I like to play with yarn!
🐈 I am a small, furry animal that likes to purr
🦴 I like to chew on bones!
🎾 I like to play fetch!
🐕 I wag my tail when I am happy
🌾 I like to eat grass
🥛 I give you milk
🐄 I am a large farm animal

animal.question: I go 'Quack!' and like to swim. Who am I?

hints.text: 🟠 I have orange feet!
🦆 I waddle when I walk
💦 I love to swim in a pond.

animal.question: I have a long trunk. Who am I?

hints.text: 🥜 I like to eat peanuts!
🐘 I am very big
🚿 I use my long nose to spray water

animal.question: I have fluffy wool. Who am I?

hints.text: 🐑 I say 'Baa!'
🌱 I eat grass
🧥 You can make clothes out of my wool

animal.question: I have black and white stripes. Who am I?

hints.text: 🦓 I live in Africa!
🐎 I look a little like a horse
🦓 My stripes help me blend in with the tall grass

animal.question: I swing from trees. Who am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I love to eat bananas!
🐒 I like to play in the jungle
🗣️ I can make many different sounds

animal.question: I have a big mane and roar loudly. Who am I?

hints.text: 👑 I am called the King!
🦁 I live in Africa
🐾 You can find me hunting in the savanna

animal.question: I hop and carry my baby in a pouch. Who am I?

hints.text: 🇦🇺 I live in Australia!
🌱 I eat plants.
🦘 I have very strong legs.

bug.question: I have spots and I can fly. What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have round spots on my back
🍃 You might find me on a leaf
☀️ I like sunny days

bug.question: I make honey and buzz around flowers. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌼 I love to visit colorful flowers
🍯 People like to eat what I make
🐝 I live in a hive with lots of friends

bug.question: I wiggle on the ground and like to eat leaves. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 I might be found in an apple
🐛 I turn into something beautiful
🌱 I like to munch on green plants

bug.question: I jump very high and make a chirping sound. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am often green and hard to see
🦗 I rub my legs together to make noise
☀️ I love to jump in sunny fields

bug.question: I walk on walls, and spin a web. Who am I?

hints.text: 🕸️ I build my home to catch other bugs
🕷️ I have eight legs
🏠 My web can be found in corners

bug.question: I carry food in a line. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I am very small and work hard
🧺 I can carry things much bigger than myself
🏠 I live in a colony with many friends

bug.question: I have big wings and I love to fly at night. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌑 I am active when the sun goes down
🦋 Some people think I am a type of butterfly
💡 I am attracted to lights

bug.question: I have a long body with many legs and curl up when scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🪵 I live under rocks and logs
💯 People say I have lots of legs
⚽️ I curl up in a ball for protection

bug.question: I am long and skinny and wiggle around in the water. What am I?

hints.text: 💧 Fish like to eat me
🪰 I grow up to be a flying insect
🦟 Some people don't like me because I bite

bug.question: I am a colorful bug that can blend in with leaves and look like a stick. What am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I like to hide in trees
🌳 I look very similar to a part of a tree
🧍 I am very good at camouflage
